resources.string: WELCOME TO DEALSCHASR!\n\nFIND REAL TIME VOUCHERS AND DEALS AT YOUR LOCAL PUBS, BARS AND VENUES
LOOK ON THE MAP FOR YOUR FAVOURITE VENUES OR EVEN LOOK FOR SOMETHING NEW
CHOSEN YOUR VENUE AND THEY HAVE A VOUCHER? REDEEM IT THERE AND THEN
GET TO THE VENUE BEFORE YOUR VOUCHER EXPIRES, SHOW THE VOUCHER AND ENJOY YOUR DEAL!
NOW YOU ARE READY TO CHASE SOME DEALS!
